sense.gloss: disappearance, running away, going missing, absconding
court decision declaring a missing person legally dead
disappearance (longer than one year after an accident or disaster), missing and presumed dead

sdata.j: ↑我々↑↓われわれ↓はその↑医者↑↓いしゃ↓の↑失踪↑↓しっそう↓について↑調査↑↓ちょうさ↓しなければならない。
sdata.e: We have to look into the disappearance of the doctor.

sdata.j: ３↑日↑↓にち↓↑後↑↓ご↓になってはじめて↑彼女↑↓かのじょ↓が↑失踪↑↓しっそう↓したことを↑知↑↓し↓った。
sdata.e: It was not until three days after that I knew she had disappeared.

sdata.j: ↑警察↑↓けいさつ↓は↑彼↑↓かれ↓の↑失踪↑↓しっそう↓を↑調査↑↓ちょうさ↓している。
sdata.e: The police are looking into his disappearance.

sdata.j: ↑彼女↑↓かのじょ↓の↑失踪↑↓しっそう↓で↑謎↑↓なぞ↓が↑一段↑↓いちだん↓と↑面白↑↓おもしろ↓くなった。
sdata.e: Her disappearance gave zest to the mystery.

sdata.j: バーミューダトライアングルでの↑失踪↑↓しっそう↓は↑不可解↑↓ふかかい↓です。
sdata.e: The disappearances in the Bermuda Triangle are inexplicable.

sdata.j: ↑小↑↓ちい↓さな↑田舎町↑↓いなかまち↓で↑起↑↓お↓きた↑失踪↑↓しっそう↓↑事件↑↓じけん↓と↑殺人↑↓さつじん↓↑事件↑↓じけん↓で、↑町中↑↓まちじゅう↓がてんやわんやだ。
sdata.e: The small rural village was in disarray after the disappearance and murder incidents.

sdata.j: ↑不法↑↓ふほう↓↑就労↑↓しゅうろう↓がバレたので、↑失踪↑↓しっそう↓を↑図↑↓はか↓りました。
sdata.e: It was exposed that they were doing illegal work, so they planned their disappearance.

words.gloss: disappearance, running away, going missing, absconding
court decision declaring a missing person legally dead
